title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: But Mom, all the guys are going to Cartman's Grandma's for the weekend!

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: I'm sorry, Stanley. I can't let you go all the way to Nebraska by yourself. It's the holidays.

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: But all the other guys get to go to Cartman's Grandma's; why can't I?

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: I'll leave it up to your father.

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: Eh, it's fine with me.

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: The answer is no, Stanley! Now go wash up for supper!

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: I don't want your lame-ass supper!

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: Ew! You're gonna get it now!

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: Go to your room, Stanley! Right now!

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: Can't tell me what to do! I'm eight years old!  I don't need this stupid family anyway!

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: Outside the Cartman house. Liane is packing the boys' gear into her station wagon. Kyle's parents and Kenny's parents are seeing them off

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: It's so nice of you to take all the boys with you

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: Oh, it's my pleasure. Eric loves his little friends.

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: Every time I go to my Grandma's house, she gives me a present. You watch: as soon as I walk in the door she'll hand me a biiig present, for no reason, except that I'm cool.

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: That's nice, Cartman.

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: Now, remember, if they have left-over turkey, put some in a bag and bring it home, okay?

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: (Okay.)

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: Okay, let's go!

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: Oh, I didn't think you were coming, Stan.

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: 'Course I'm coming! Come on, let's hurry!

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: Goodbye, bubbe! Be careful!

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: See you in a couple of days, son.

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: Shotgun! It's my car, I call it first: shotgun!  Kenny, I called it shotgun! Damn it, Kenny, get in the back!  Hey, Kenny, there's a sale on orange jackets over there.  Look, Kenny, there's an elephant parade!  Ken-ny. Kenny, look. Look! Go get it , Go get it!  ha ha ha, you poor piece o'crap.

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: So, how far is it to Nebraska?

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: Around six hours.

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: Oh my God! What the hell are we gonna do for six hours?

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: Well, I've got an idea. We could sing.

text: Yeah. Or, we could not.

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: Wheat. The building block of your favorite foods, and, Nebraska's principal source of economic productivity. You see, when Nebraska first became-

text: Hey, look!  See Mr. Hankey at the Mall of Nebraska Wow! We have to go, dude!

text: Dude, I thought Mr. Hankey lived in the sewer. What's he doing in Nebraka?

text: I don't know. Ever since he was in that movie, he got all famous.

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: Oh, so now everybody wants to meet Mr. Hankey! He's a piece of crap.

text: It doesn't matter. He'll be most excited to meet me!

text: Cool!

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: About another hour, hon.

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: Why does Grandma have to live so far away? Why don't we just stick her in a nursing home closer to us so  I don't have to drive six hours to get a god-damned present!

text: Now, Eric, let's try to get out of that grumpy mood before we get to Grandma's.

text: Nice to have you heuh.

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: I'm not fat, I'm big-boned. Ech.

text: Wait a minute. This isn't a present, it's a shirt!

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: Yes. I thought that would look really good on you.

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: Are you telling me that I drove nine hours thrugh butt-fucking nowhere to get a god-damned shirt?! Mom, Grandma's gone senile! It's time to stick her in a home!

title: MERRY CHRISTMAS  CHARLIE MANSON
text: The dining room. The thirteen are seated around it. The TV is at the foot of the table, on its own chair

text: Well, this is what the holidays are about. Family.

text: Yeah, right!

text: Well, it certainly is nice we could all gather heuh for the holidays. Even Uncle Howard has joined us live, via satellite, from the state penitentiary.

text: Amen.
